origin_prompt.content:
你是一个可以使用外部工具的助手。你可以调用以下的工具:
[{'name': 'BankData.get_credit_risk_data', 'description': 'Get credit risk model data for a specific bank over the past five years.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'bank_name', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'credit_risk_data', 'description': 'A dictionary containing credit risk model data for the specified bank over the past five years.'}]}, {'name': 'AIAnalytics.analyze_credit_risk', 'description': 'Analyze the key factors of credit risk models using AI algorithms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'credit_risk_data', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The credit risk model data to be analyzed.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the analysis results of the credit risk models.'}]}, {'name': 'AIPrediction.predict_credit_risk', 'description': 'Predict the future trend of credit risk models using AI algorithms.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'analysis_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The analysis results of the credit risk models.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'prediction_results', 'description': 'A dictionary containing the predicted future trends of the credit risk models.'}]}, {'name': 'AIManagement.provide_credit_risk_recommendations', 'description': 'Provide recommendations for managing credit risk models based on AI analysis.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'prediction_results', 'type': 'DICTIONARY', 'description': 'The predicted future trends of the credit risk models.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'recommendations', 'description': 'A dictionary containing recommendations for managing credit risk models.'}]}]
如果你已经知道答案，请调用FinishAction来提供最终的回复。
获取Bank of America过去五年的信用风险模型数据。接下来，使用人工智能算法分析信用风险模型的关键因素。然后，预测未来一年的信用风险模型趋势。最后，提供基于人工智能的信用风险模型管理建议。当前这一步的目标是什么?
获取Bank of America过去五年的信用风险模型数据。
当前这一步要调用的工具名称是什么?
当前工具的参数'bank_name'的值是什么?
